cookieBanner.description: This website uses third party cookies (Google Analytics).
cookieBanner.title: Do you want to allow cookies?

metadata.aboutUsDescription: The Catalan Organ Association (ACO) is a non-profit organization that aims to bring together all the elements that make up the world of organs in Catalonia.
metadata.associationsDescription: Collection of the different associations that exist in Catalonia that have formed around the different organs. Friends of the organ.
metadata.concertSeriesDescription: The «Organs of Catalonia» series consists of a set of summer concerts that give voice to the different historical organs scattered throughout the Catalan territory, as well as a large number of renowned organists.
metadata.educationDescription: Collection of music training centers in Catalonia that have organ classes at all levels, from elementary to intermediate or professional to advanced.
metadata.factSheetDescription: The quarterly publication with the latest news exclusively for members.
metadata.newsDescription: News from the Catalan Organ Association.
metadata.pipeOrgansDescription: Inventory of organs in Catalonia. Catalonia organ finder. Organs classified by organ builder, by constructor, by town, region, province and bishopric.
metadata.privacyPolicyDescription: Privacy policy for using the website.
metadata.privacyPolicyMembersDescription: Privacy policy when becoming a member of the Catalan Organ Association.
metadata.referencesDescription: Collection of bibliography about the organs of Catalonia and about the organ in general.

navbar.associationsDescription: Friends of the organs: associations to preserve and disseminate.
navbar.concertSeriesDescription: Relive the sound of the past rediscovering our land.
navbar.educationDescription: Centers and resources for organ training.
navbar.factSheetDescription: The quarterly publication with the latest news exclusively for members.
navbar.newsDescription: The latest current notes in blog format.
navbar.pipeOrgansDescription: Map of the organs of the principality in constant growth.
navbar.referencesDescription: History, booklets, bibliography and music of Catalan organs.
